regexCodeList.string: return isPrompt()
Password correct. Welcome to Lusternia.

Trigger.name: Get GMCP Comms String
Trigger.script:
local ignorec = {"foo"} local ignoret = false
for i,v in pairs(ignorec) do if matches[2]:find(v) or matches[2]:find(v:title()) then ignoret = true end end
if not ignoret and not string.find(gmcp.Comm.Channel.Text.text, "Targeting:") and not string.find(matches[1], "I will lead") then if gmcp.Comm.Channel.Text.channel == "shipt" then only_to_misc = true else only_to_misc = false end GMCP.processChat(GMCP.chat_channels.last) end

regexCodeList.string: return isPrompt()

^.*? Timequake (comes into being|manifests|invades existence|comes into existence|comes into existence\, peppering reality with afterimages of eyes\, tentacles\, tongues\, and teeth that congeal and writhe with malice)\.$

Distortions in movement spread across your surroundings, breaking all into shattered shades of dayand night. Time melts with the sound of heavy, tramping feet that echoes across Lusternia as a Desolate Timequake comes into existence.

Reality wavers and bucks, the world stopping and starting erratically around you. The sound ofchisel upon stone and the felling of trees echoes across Lusternia as a Distant Timequake comes into existence.
A great thrumming shudders through all creation, blurring as if within an all-encompassing heat haze. The soothing sounds of water and light music ripple past as an Impending Timequake manifests.

Brilliant flares of colour fill the firmament as spires of crystal rise up on the horizon, the rays of sunlight reflecting from them freezing time in place as they paint your surroundings in a spectacular palette. Time jumps as light refracts and moves over your surroundings with the arrival of an Immaculate Timequake.

An almighty roar sunders the heavens, sending fractures striating across the firmament as if thevery skies had been shattered like glass. The slow, buffeting beat of monstrous wings shakes the world as a Distant Timequake comes into being.

]Time freezes abruptly around you with a sound like the shattering of glass, a heavy, oppressivepsionic power hanging in the air. The clank of chains can be heard amid the snaps of whips as a Desolate Timequake invades existence.
^You are\:$

Trigger.name: Get Vitals
Trigger.script:
deleteLine() local lower = matches[2] local upper = matches[3] local stat = matches[4]
op.succor.me.vitals[stat] = { lower = lower, upper = upper }

e:echo("We diagnosed ourself.") e:echo("Afflictions: "..((affs[1] and utils.concatAnd(affs)) or "None")..".")

deleteLine() local target = matches[2] local lower = matches[3] local upper = matches[4] local stat = matches[5]
op.succor[target].vitals[stat] = { lower = lower, upper = upper }

Trigger.name: Succor Afflictions Gate Close
Trigger.script:
deleteLine()
local dangerous = { "aeon", "anorexia", "asthma", "crushedwindpipe", "ectoplasm", "slickness", "slitthroat", "throatlock" }
local patient = matches[2] local affs = op.succor[patient].afflictions
e:echo("We diagnosed "..patient..".") e:echo("Afflictions: "..((affs[1] and utils.concatAnd(affs)) or "None")..".")
setTriggerStayOpen("Succor Afflictions Gate", 0)
if patient == op.target then local aff_check = aegis.getSuccorAffs(patient)
end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) has (\d+) affliction(s)?\.$

Trigger.name: NameDB qw
Trigger.script:
-- ignore yourself gemmed if multimatches[1][1] == "None." or multimatches[1][1] == "You can not sense a single person." then return end
-- separate the list of names local data = multimatches[1][1] data = string.split(data, ", ")
-- fix last name that ends with a period data[#data] = string.sub(data[#data], 1, #data[#data] - 1)
for i=1,#data do -- handle names that appear in brackets local name = data[i] if name:find("(", 1, true) then name = data[i]:match("%((%w+)%)") end end
ndb.tempnamelist = data
local checkall = 0 if ndb.qwtype == "update" then checkall = 1 end
raiseEvent("NameDB got name list", checkall) disableTrigger("NameDB qw")

regexCodeList.string: ^(?:\(\*\) Currently, there are|There are)

Trigger.name: Org enemies
Trigger.script:
local orgenemylist = false for _,org in pairs(ndb.valid.orgs) do if multimatches[2][1]:find(org) then orgenemylist = true break end end
if not orgenemylist then return end
local data = multimatches[4][1] data = string.split(data, ", ")
ndb.enemylist = data
raiseEvent("NameDB got enemy list")

regexCodeList.string: Enemies of the
ANSI_COLORS_F{002}_B{000}
Total:
You scent at the air, your skilled nose picking up the faint traces of others in the surrounding area.
You snort and snuffle at the air, sensing through .+ upon your face the faint traces of others in the surrounding area.
A pert little nose takes in a delicate whiff of your surroundings, sensing the faint traces of others in the nearby area.
You tilt back your head and inhale deeply through your nose, the whiskers of a wolf's snout upon your face twitching as you sense the faint traces of others in the surrounding area.
Your snout twitches and trembles at the air, sensing through a cute little rabbit nose upon your face the faint traces of others in the surrounding area.
You sniff disdainfully at the air with a snobby snoot, wrinkling your nose as you sense the faint traces of others in the nearby area.
Your snout twitches and trembles at the air, sensing through a striped badger nose upon your face the faint traces of others in the surrounding area.
You twitch your snout and scent the air, sensing through a scaled fink nose upon your face the faint traces of others in the surrounding area.

return isPrompt()
You gently coax the wind into telling you its secrets, and attempt to discern the locations of other Ascendants:

return isPrompt()

Trigger.name: NameDB cwho name
Trigger.script:
local line = line local name = line:match("^(%w+)") local rank = line:sub(ndb.temp_cwho.rank, ndb.temp_cwho.position-1):trim() local position = line:sub(ndb.temp_cwho.position-1, ndb.temp_cwho.ct-1):trim()
table.insert(ndb.tempnamelist, name)

regexCodeList.string: return not isPrompt() and not line:starts("-") and not line:starts("*") and not line:starts("Currently, there")

Trigger.name: End NameDB cwho
Trigger.script:
setTriggerStayOpen("NameDB cwho", 0)
raiseEvent("NameDB got name list", 0)

regexCodeList.string: Currently, there

Trigger.name: Citizens/Members
Trigger.script:
ndb.tempnamelist = {}
local templist = string.split(multimatches[3][1], ",")
for i,k in pairs(templist) do templist[i] = k:trim() end
-- last on name on list might have a dot if string.sub(templist[#templist], -1, -1) == "." then templist[#templist] = string.sub(templist[#templist], 1, -2) end
for i,j in ipairs(templist) do table.insert(ndb.tempnamelist, j) end
raiseEvent("NameDB got name list", 0)

send("curio attach "..curio.." to 40986")

regexCodeList.string: ^(\d+)\s+Piece\s+.+(?:Yes|N\/A)$
You dance to the spirit of the moon, asking for protection. A soft light suffuses you.
You are already surrounded by the moon aura.
Todo
You dance joyously to the spirit of the Moon and are bathed in a soft lunar light which suffusesyour body.
The soft lunar light suffusing your body fades away.
Leaping from your skin the energy fills the air, bathing your surroundings in the fair energies ofthe Domotheos of Justice, supporting your righteous cause.
^You hold .+ to your lips and blow a light, twinkling ditty. As the notes fade,you cannot help but look around with avarice in your eyes\.$
^You hold .+ to your lips and blow a light, twinkling ditty. As the notes fade,you see the world through less avaricious eyes\.$
You read a Scroll of Protection.
^\w+ dissolves the shimmering field around you\.$
The shimmering field around you dissolves.
^You quickly wind up .+ as tightly as you can. The hands on .+ begin to spin faster and faster and time, itself, seems to distort around you\.$
You feel less protected against variations in time.
^You rub (.+) and it begins to glow with a pulsating light\.$
^A ray of (\w+) light suddenly spotlights you\.$
green
purple
pink
golden
You narrow your eyes and look around greedily for something to add to your hoard.
You allow the charm of Acquisitio to leave you and are no longer gripped by an unnatural need to accumulate things.
You are already surrounded with a cosmic nimbus.
A nimbus of glittering motes blossoms around you.
You briefly hold your hand over your mouth until your lips and tongue tingle.
You are already water walking.
You pinch the air with your fingers and draw a cosmic web to cast about your feet. You sense that gravity will be your ally when entering water.
You are already walking on a small cushion of air.
You begin to rise on a cushion of air.
^You take a drink of (.+) from .+\.$
Your blood surges as the black tea enters your system.
The flowery tea awakens a passion within you.
As you sip the white tea, your thoughts become clearer.
Your movements become fluid as you drink the green tea.
The dark brew stokes a delicious fire within your belly.
You sigh contentedly as the amber brew takes away your pain.
Quicksilver is already coursing through your bloodstream.
You feel the quicksilver begin to work its way into your bloodstream.
A lulling tingle races through your body.
Your speed defence is destroyed.
^Your enhanced vivaciousness repels (blackout|epilepsy|clumsiness)\.$
^Your enhanced movement repels (paralysis|rigormortis|weakness)\.$
^Your enhanced passion repels (pacifism|peace|recklessness)\.$
^Your enhanced insight repels (stupidity|deadening|dementia)\.$
You belch loudly and begin to feel the pain.
You belch deeply and no longer feel so stoked.
A pale glow surrounds you as the moonwater soothes you.
You eat a kafe bean.
An instant feeling of excitement and edginess overcomes you.
You feel yourself calm down as the effects of kafe wear off.
You take out some dragonsblood oil and quickly rub it on your skin.
As you luxuriantly rub the resinous, red oil into your skin, you sniff abruptly and inhale the enticing aroma of dragon's blood.
You take out some jasmine oil and quickly rub it on your skin.
As you luxuriantly rub the golden oil into your skin, you sniff abruptly and inhale the sweet and floral odour of jasmine.
You take out some musk oil and quickly rub it on your skin.
As you luxuriantly rub the thick, purple oil into your skin, you sniff abruptly and inhale the pungent scent of musk.
You take out some sandalwood oil and quickly rub it on your skin.
As you luxuriantly rub the slippery, lutescent oil into your skin, you sniff abruptly and inhale the clean fragrance of sandalwood.
You take out some vanilla oil and quickly rub it on your skin.
As you luxuriantly rub the smooth, caramel coloured oil into your skin, you sniff abruptly and inhale the buttery redolence of vanilla.
^The faint hint of (\w+) oil disappears and you find yourself no longer coated in it\.$
^Warm water showers down upon yourself, and you scrub all over until the (\w+) oil on your skin is gone\.$
^You begin to vigorously scrub yourself all over, trying to remove the (\w+) oil that coats your skin\.$
^\w+'s hands begin to glow with scalding warmth and (?:they|she|he) pass(?:es)? them over the surface of yourbody, removing the (\w+) oil covering you\.$
^You release .+ and it flutters into the air and around you, its kirigami charm dissolving into the air around you as the vellum disappears in tiny motes of dust\.$
Your kirigami blessing expires prematurely, leaving you feeling drawn and tired.
A swirling energy suddenly manifests around you and collapses inward, briefly taking the shape of a kirigami before it vanishes, leaving you curiously refreshed.
^You release .+ and it flutters into the air and around you, its wet fold origami charm dissolving into the air around you as the vellum disappears in tiny motes of dust\.$
Your wet fold origami blessing expires prematurely, leaving you feeling drawn and tired.
A swirling energy suddenly manifests around you and collapses inward, briefly taking the shape of a wet fold origami before it vanishes, leaving you curiously refreshed.
You begin to examine your surroundings with a keen eye.
You are already alerted by a keen eye.
You cease using your keen eye.
You are not currently alerted by a keen eye.
Your vision sharpens with light as you gain night sight.
Your eyes are already attuned to the shadows of night.
You now possess the gift of the third eye.
You already possess the thirdeye.
You relax your thirdeye.
You do not have the thirdeye.
You already possess the gift of the sixth sense.
You begin to concentrate on the sixth sense...
You no longer see the world through your sixth sense.
You do not have sixth sense up.
You shut your eyes and concentrate on the end of life. A moment later, you feel inextricably linked with the strings of fate.
Your mind is already linked to the strings of fate.
You shut your eyes and concentrate on life. A moment later, you feel your link with the strings of fate sever.
Your mind is not currently linked to the strings of fate.
You will now lip read to overcome the effects of deafness.
You are already lipreading.
You bow your head and concentrate on blurring your personal energies until your power is masked.
Your power is already masked.
You open your eyes wide, concentrating on the small strands of aether around you.
You are already sensing disruptions in the aether.
You close your eyes for a moment, and cease concentrating on the aether.
You are not currently sensing disruptions in the aether.
Spreading your arms wide, you spin clockwise and visualize a circle of protection. A shimmering white orb springs up around you.
Pressing your hands together before you, you concentrate on your root chakra. A red glow runs down your spine, helping anchor you to the earth.
The red chakra already burns bright within your body.
You allow the red chakra to burn out.
Your red chakra is not burning within you.
Pressing your hands together before you, you concentrate on your belly chakra. An orange glow suffuses the area around your stomach and the pangs of hunger disappear.
The orange chakra already burns bright within your body.
Pressing your hands together before you, you concentrate on your solar plexus chakra. A golden glow suffuses your solar plexus and your body swells with power.
The yellow chakra already burns bright within your body.
Pressing your hands together before you, you concentrate on your throat chakra. A blue glow suffuses your throat, protecting all your communications.
The blue chakra already burns bright within your body.
Turning to the west, you beseech the Spirits of Autumn to make your harvest plentiful. A sparkling wind comes forth and wraps around you, promising your harvests will be fruitful.
The autumn wind is already with you.

Pressing your hands together before you, you concentrate on all your chakras together. A serpent of rainbow energy surges up from the root of your spine and travels to the top of your head, bursting forth from your crown chakra and surrounding you with an aura of prismatic energy.
You clench your fists, grit your teeth, and banish all possibility of sleep.
You are already an insomniac.
Through force of will, you allow your insomnia to dissipate and feel a blissful wave of tiredness wash over you.
You are not an insomniac.
You now possess the gift of truehearing.
You already possess truehearing.
You no longer hear the world through your truehearing.
You will yourself to become oblivious to your surroundings.
You already are oblivious to your surroundings.
You allow yourself to become aware of your surroundings.
You aren't oblivious to your surroundings.
You order your mind to ensure you will not journey far into the dreamworld.
You already have metawake turned on.
You cease concentrating on maintaining distance from the dreamworld.
You already have metawake turned off.
You inhale deeply and begin holding your breath.
You are already holding your breath.
You can hold your breath no longer and gasp for air, fighting to bring oxygen back to your deprived muscles.
You rub your hands together greedily.
You already are a selfish bastard.
A feeling of generosity spreads throughout you.
No worries. You're not a selfish bastard as is.
^Kneeling to place a hand upon the ground, you close your eyes and breathe deeply, allowing your senses to intermingle with the (.+) around you\.$
You are already attuned to this environment.
You are not currently attuned to any environments.

Focusing your will on the bond between you and the environment here, you draw as much strength as you can before the bond snaps completely in a sudden wave of energy which fills your every fibre with a soothing warmth.
Summoning all your influence, you begin to verily radiate charisma, creating an aura about yourself and those loyal to you.
You already exude a charismatic aura.
Your posture relaxes as you allow your charismatic aura to drain away, your mind feeling less strained, though those loyal to you appear slightly disappointed.
You already don't exude a charismatic aura.
You take a deep breath and mentally shift into performance mode.
You are already in performance.
You let out a deep breath and release yourself from performing.
You aren't in performance mode.
You purse your lips and narrow your eyes, taking on a lawyerly attitude.
You already bear yourself with a lawyerly demeanor.
You take a deep breath and look up innocently through lowered lashes, taking on a saintly attitude.
You already bear yourself with a saintly demeanor.
You jut out your jaw and thin your lips, taking on the demeanor of a zealot.
You already bear yourself with the demeanor of a zealot.
Furrowing your brow into a scowl, you clench your jaw and flare your nostrils, twisting your lips into a cruel grin.
You transform yourself into a bully!
You relax your clenched jaw and unfurrow your brow, no longer performing the role of the bully.
Slicking back your hair, you put on your best greasy grin and bob your head like a toady.
You transform yourself into a sycophant!
You wipe the smirk from your lips and shake your shoulders loose, no longer performing the role of the sycophant.
Puffing up your chest in self-importance, you plaster a condescending smile on your lips and develop a knowing smirk.
You transform yourself into a bureaucrat!
You deflate your puffed up chest and still the smirk from your lips, no longer performing the role of the bureaucrat.
Tossing back your hair, you rub some life in your cheeks and smile sensually.
You transform yourself into a gorgeous beauty!
You smooth the sensuality from your features and relax, no longer performing the role of the gorgeous beauty.
You tousle your hair and rub dirt on your face, then hunch your shoulders in a slouch.
You transform yourself into a vagabond!
You wipe the dirt off your face and straighten up, no longer performing the role of the vagabond.
Straightening your posture and calming yourself down, you begin to exude an aura of forgiveness and serenity.
You transform yourself into a diplomat!
You relax your posture and allow yourself to speak normally, no longer seeking to draw out forgiveness in others.
You belch and begin swaying back and forth like a drunkard.
You are already acting like a drunkard.
You cease acting drunk.
You stand up a little straighter and try to act more sober.
You are already acting sober.
You cease acting sober.
You begin a performance to act more wounded than you are.
You are already performing as though wounded.
You cease acting wounded.
You review the performances of others around you.
You are already reviewing performances.
You cease reviewing the performances of others.
You aren't reviewing anyone.
You call upon the spirit of squirrel to provide sustenance for you. You cannot stifle a giggle as you are tickled by tiny paws running over your skin.
You call upon the spirit of mother night to hide you. Her dark presence makes your skin crawl.
You call upon the spirit of skunk. You wrinkle your nose as his musky presence envelops you.
You call upon the spirit of sun and a warm ray of sunlight infuses you with confidence.
You call upon the spirit of the great rock to ground you to the earth, and you feel your feet become encased in clay.
You call upon the spirit of moon and a soft shaft of moonlight beams down upon you, filling you with power.
You call upon the spirit of crow and feel oily black feathers caress your skin, making you shudder.
You call upon the spirit of tree to heal you. A gentle breeze carries a rich and loamy scent which invigorates you.
You call upon the spirit of groundhog to grant you the gift of burrowing. Your nostrils fill with the scent of earth and a claw brushes your cheek gently.
You call upon the spirit of rainbow trout, and a fine spray of water cools your skin.
You call upon the spirit of wolf to give you courage. As the power of Wolf infuses you, you let out a howl of the wild.
You call upon the spirit of bear and feel a powerful rush of strength course through your veins. You let loose a vigorous roar of exhilaration.
You call upon the spirit of stag and your scalp itches as invisible antlers sprout from your head.
You call upon the spirit of monkey and surrender yourself to a sudden urge to drag your knuckles on the ground and whoop.
You call upon the spirit of horse and an electrifying surge of energy ripples through your legs, forcing you to neigh loudly.
You call upon the spirit of the river daughter and laugh joyously as water swirls over your body.
You call upon the spirit of snake and feel cool silky coils winding over your skin.
You call upon all the spirits of Nature, and a whirlwind of power surrounds you, briefly lifting you from the ground. As every spirit embraces you, you shudder and tremble in delight.
^You release the spirit of (\w+), silently thanking the spirit for bonding with you\.$
^You are not bonded to the spirit of (\w+)\.$
You call upon the spirit of the stag to protect you, and your skin turns into a thick stag's hide.
Ceremoniously, you dab some green tint upon your face, creating the pattern of an image of the greenman.
You already have an image of the greenman painted on your face.
Ceremoniously, you dab some yellow tint upon your face, creating the pattern of bright rays of sunshine.
You already have an image of trueheart painted on your face.
Ceremoniously, you dab some blue tint upon your face, creating the pattern of lightning bolts.
You already have lightning bolts painted on your face.
Ceremoniously, you dab some red tint upon your face, creating the pattern of stripes.
You already have swift stripes painted on your face.
You wipe the paints off your face.
You have no face paints to wipe off.
You call upon the spirit of the stag to guide you. Your legs tingle as the stag pours his blessings on you.
You feel your legs settle down.
You call upon Stag and throw wide your arms. You embrace the presence of Stag as he manifests and your heart thuds as antlers sprout upon your head.
You concentrate for a moment, and your skin becomes rough and thick like tree bark.
Your skin is already covered in protective bark.
You kneel and place a palm on the ground, imploring nature to hide you from prying eyes.
You step forth from your hiding.
^You thump the ground with your (\w+) and feel a connection with the earth\.$
You are already rooted.
You are no longer rooted.
You are not currently rooted.
^You raise .+ up and make a circle in the air\. A radiant torc forms from the ether and settles around your neck\.$
A silver torc cracks and crumbles to dust.
You reach into the foliage surrounding you, inhaling the scents and taking in the cacophony of the surrounding nature, merging yourself within it.
You are one with the trees already.
You weave a mental shield around your body.
You fluidly wave your arms about your body and notice that with each pass pieces of phantom armour are revealed. Finally, you appraise your body and admire the purple sheen now surrounding you.
You already don a suit of phantom armour.
Within the blink of an eye, your phantom armour dissipates into the aether.
You take a deep breath and fill your cheeks with air until they bulge out. After a moment, the airin your cheeks disappears and is absorbed into you.
You are already walking on a small cushion of air.
Calling the powers of the elemental earth, your skin hardens with a layer of supple granite.
You already are coated with stone.
You briefly hold your hand over your mouth until your lips and tongue tingle.
You are already filtering air out of water.
You cross your arms and a shimmering elemental shield surrounds you.
You already possess an element shield.
You rub your hands up and down your arms, lighting small fires that quickly spread and cover yourentire body before quickly dying out.
You are already fireproof.
You create a biofeedback loop within your mind to protect against magic.
You create a biofeedback loop within your mind to protect against fire.
You create a biofeedback loop within your mind to protect against cold.
You create a biofeedback loop within your mind to protect against electric.
You concentrate on forcing your body to become more dense.
You have already become more dense.
You raise a mental bar around your mind.
You already have a mental bar around your mind.
You mentally raise a psychic field that surrounds your body.
With great concentration, you focus all thoughts upon your inner self.
You now possess the gift of the sixthsense.
You already possess the gift of the sixth sense.

Timer.name: Feed Beast
Timer.script: sendAll( "outr meatfeed", "beast fill feedbag with meatfeed", "inr everything" )

Alias.name: Run Command
Alias.script:
local f, e = loadstring("return "..matches[2]) if not f then f, e = assert(loadstring(matches[2])) end
local r = function(...) if not table.is_empty({...}) then display(...) end end r(f())

Alias.name: Test Queue Actions (Multiple Items)
Succor Target
Alias.script:
local t = matches[2] or " me"
op.succortarget = t balqueue:add({code = "succor"..t, required = {"op.bals.balance", "op.bals.equilibrium"}}) qm.Check()

Alias.name: Succor Room
Alias.script:
local people = op.players
ui.oecho("Grabbing player afflictions (Room)")
for person in pairs(people) do balqueue:add("succor "..person) end
qm.Check()

Alias.name: (qw update) Re-check people on qw list
(ndb delete person) Delete one individual entry
Alias.script:
if matches[2] == "all" then return end -- handled by another alias
local name = matches[2]:title()
local exists = db:fetch(ndb.db.people, db:eq(ndb.db.people.name, name))
if not (exists and next(exists)) then ndb.echo(name.. " already doesn't exist in the database.") return end
db:delete(ndb.db.people, db:eq(ndb.db.people.name, name))
ndb.echo("Deleted " .. name .. " from the database.") killTrigger(ndb.highlightIds[name])

ScriptGroup.name: Init
ScriptGroup.script:
e = {
	echo			= function (self, args) cecho(string.format("%s", "
<sienna>[<burlywood>Outpost<sienna>]<burlywood>: <SeaGreen>Info: <slate_grey>") .. args:title()) end,
	shortecho	= function (self, args) cecho(string.format("%s", "
<sienna>[<burlywood>Outpost<sienna>]<burlywood>: <slate_grey>") .. args:title()) end,
	warn			= function (self, args) cecho(string.format("%s", "
<sienna>[<burlywood>Outpost<sienna>]<burlywood>: <gold>Warning: <slate_grey>") .. args:title() .. ".
") end,
	error			= function (self, args) cecho(string.format("%s", "
<sienna>[<burlywood>Outpost<sienna>]<burlywood>: <white:red>Error:<red:black> ") .. args:title() .. ".
") end,
	debug			= function (self, args) cecho(string.format("%s", "
<sienna>[<burlywood>Outpost<sienna>]<burlywood>: <dark_orange>Debug: <slate_grey>") .. args:title() .. ".
") end,
	queue			= function (self, args) cecho(string.format("%s", "
<sienna>[<burlywood>Outpost<sienna>]<burlywood>: <MediumPurple>Queue: <slate_grey>") .. args:title() .. ".
") end,
	gotAff		= function (self, args) cecho(string.format("%s", "
<sienna>[<burlywood>AFF<sienna>]<burlywood>: <OrangeRed>Gained: <thistle>") .. args:upper() .. ".
") end,
	curedAff	= function (self, args) cecho(string.format("%s", "
<sienna>[<burlywood>AFF<sienna>]<burlywood>: <SpringGreen>Cured: <thistle>") .. args .. ".
") end
}

Script.name: OutpostInitialise
Script.script:
function OutpostInitialise() local system_check = lfs.attributes(getMudletHomeDir().."/Outpost")
if not system_check then downloadOutpost() return end
op = {} op.auras = {} op.bals = {} op.config = {} op.stats = {} op.succor = {} op.vitals = {} op.version = "0.12"
local path = package.path local cpath = package.cpath local homedir = getMudletHomeDir() local luadir = string.format("%s/%s", homedir, [[?.lua]]) local initdir = string.format("%s/%s", homedir, [[?/init.lua]]) local sysdir = string.format("%s/%s", homedir.."/Outpost/Outpost-master", [[?.lua]])
package.path = string.format("%s;%s;%s;%s", path, luadir, initdir, sysdir) package.cpath = string.format("%s;%s;%s;%s", cpath, luadir, initdir, sysdir)
SYSROOT_DEFINED = true
local s, c = pcall(require, "outpost")
if not s then display(c) debugc("Failed to load core system module!") end
package.path = path package.cpath = cpath end
function downloadOutpost() e:error("Outpost folder not found. Creating filesystem structure...") lfs.mkdir(getMudletHomeDir().."/Outpost") lfs.mkdir(getMudletHomeDir().."/Outpost/API") lfs.mkdir(getMudletHomeDir().."/Outpost/NDB") lfs.mkdir(getMudletHomeDir().."/Outpost/Temp") e:echo("All done! Proceeding to download core Outpost archive...") local loc = getMudletHomeDir().."/Outpost/Temp/master.zip" local url = "https://github.com/SynecticLabs/Outpost/archive/master.zip" --local url = "https://synecticlabs.net/outpost/outpost.zip"
downloadFile(loc, url) end

Script.name: OutpostDownloaded
Script.script:
function OutpostDownloaded(_, fn) if not fn:find("master.zip", 1, true) then return end
if unzipSuccessHandler then killAnonymousEventHandler(unzipSuccessHandler) end if unzipFailureHandler then killAnonymousEventHandler(unzipFailureHandler) end
unzipSuccessHandler = registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysUnzipDone", "handleUnzipEvents") unzipFailureHandler = registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysUnzipError", "handleUnzipEvents")
local file_location = getMudletHomeDir().."/Outpost/Temp/master.zip" local unzip_location = getMudletHomeDir().."/Outpost"
unzipAsync(file_location, unzip_location) end

Script.name: OutpostZipHandler
Script.script: function OutpostZipHandler(event, ...) local args = {...} local fn = args[1] local loc = args[2] if event == "sysUnzipDone" then cecho(string.format("<green>Unzip successful! Unzipped %s to %s\n", fn, loc)) elseif event == "sysUnzipError" then cecho(string.format("<firebrick>Unzip failed! Tried to unzip %s to %s\n", fn, loc)) end end

Script.name: OutpostDlErrorHandler
Script.script:
function downloadErrorEventHandler(event, errorFound) cecho("function downloadErrorEventHandler, "..errorFound) debugc("function downloadErrorEventHandler, "..errorFound) end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysDownloadError", "downloadErrorEventHandler")

Script.name: OutpostDoneLoading
Script.script:
-- Outpost has finished loading at this point with all tables and functions declared. Add your own scripts on this event.
function OutpostDoneLoading() ndb.init() end

Script.name: DownloadMudletMapper
Script.script:
function downloadMudletMapper() if not mmp then downloadFile(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/mudlet-mapper.xml",[[http://ire-mudlet-mapping.github.io/ire-mapping-script/downloads/mudlet-mapper.xml]]) registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysDownloadDone", "mudletMapperDownloaded", true) end end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysLoadEvent", "downloadMudletMapper", true)
function mudletMapperDownloaded(_, filepath) if filepath:find("mudlet-mapper.xml", 1, true) then installPackage(filepath) else return true end end

Script.name: gmcpItemsHandler
ndbAddHighlightName
ndbGotNameList
ndbDownloadDone
ndbDownloadError
outpostPackageInstalled
Add defs to queue
Script.script:
function testDefs() local deflist = { "kingdom", "beauty", "perfection", "kingdom", "waterwalk", "waterbreathe", "levitation", "nimbus", "aquisitio", "avarice", "protection", "nightsight", "thirdeye", "deathsight", "red", "yellow", "insomnia", "selfishness", "wolf", "stag" }
for _, skillset_keys in pairs(defs.tree) do for skill, skill_keys in pairs(skillset_keys) do if table.contains(deflist, skill) then balqueue:add(skill_keys.raise, skill_keys.required, skill_keys.consumed) end end end end
